title: Another, Different Truth by Fiction
post:
“Therefore no DNA…” [from earlier posting on The Sixth Station: And what theory is that?], time to look elsewhere, I suppose.  These cloning novelists certainly make the rounds: the Shroud, the Sudarium, and now the veil of Manoppelo.  My local library has a copy-yes, there is a (short) waiting list-I am in the queue.  
The XV Station: The people donned their Tinfoil hats.
author: Kelly Kearse
